title: Inting Sion
body: How does Riot let through a strat that literally includes doing something that's banned against the Summoner's Code? And worst off, it's actually one of the best strats for climbing???? Like come on now, nerf the damage and healing he does while a zombie.

replies.body:
inting is intentional feeding, doing so with the intent to make your allies lose. its only called inting sion because you give absolutely zero f's about the rest of your team and will go as far as suicide to secure a tower. but its otherwise a legitimate strat, hence why it isnt bannable.

also the first guy who even devised this strat still dies less then 6 times per game, so its not even feeding that hard.

It's like Singed. Yes, you may die. But if you leverage enough push and enemy attention, it's worth it.
It isn't just mindlessly pushing or feeding.

"Inting" sion is not about actually inting, those are trolls, and they dont climb at all.

The idea is you use his passive to steal camps or secure objectives and generally disrupt the other team. You _dont_ just die as fast as possible for no reason.
